zhcn.User-note-browserDeviceToken: Special for Service Worker Browser Push
zhcn.AppConfig-note-version: The latest mobile application version. The version will be used to compare the force update / minor update
zhcn.AppConfig-note-forceUpdate: Everytime update the mobile application version, then the forceUpdate will be turned off. You can turn on it if need to force user update the application.
zhcn.AppConfig-note-maintenanceMode: The mobile application will not accept any login request if set it to Close
zhcn.AppConfig-note-functionDate: Maximum 3 days and used for the special case
zhcn.FunctionSetting-note-ticketDeadLineHour: Hour for the deadline everyday in 24 hours format. e.g. 21:00, 12:00, 14:30
zhcn.FunctionSetting-note-welcomeParticipatio: Maximum number for Welcome Member Join, e.g. -1 means no limitation
zhcn.FunctionSetting-note-memberInvitations: Maximum number for Invitations, e.g. -1 means no limitation
zhcn.FunctionSetting-note-catchTrucks: Maximum number for catching on Trucks, e.g. -1 means no limitation
zhcn.Brand-note-orderingValue: Descending Order, high ordering value will become higher priority for display
zhcn.AboutUs-note-scheduleDate: Just for display on About Us Page in the mobile application
zhcn.AboutUs-note-shortScheduleDate: Just for display on Landing Page in the mobile application
zhcn.AboutUs-note-scheduleTime: Just for display on About Us Page in the mobile application
zhcn.AboutUs-note-location: Just for display on About Us Page in the mobile application
zhcn.AboutUs-note-shortLocation: Just for display on Landing Page in the mobile application
zhcn.AboutUs-note-regsiterScheduleDate: Just for display on Registration Page in the mobile application
zhcn.MainSlider-note-orderingValue: Descending Order, high ordering value will become higher priority for display
zhcn.Category-note-brandSize: The display size of the brands under this category shows in the Landing Page
zhcn.Category-note-orderingValue: Descending Order, high ordering value will become higher priority for display
zhcn.GiftType-note-orderingValue: Descending Order, high ordering value will become higher priority for display
zhcn.CategoryBanner-note-orderingValue: Descending Order, high ordering value will become higher priority for display
zhcn.Ticket-note-takenNormalQuantity: This quantity must be less than equals than the Normal Ticket Quantity
zhcn.Ticket-note-takenVipQuantity: This quantity must be less than equals than the VIP Ticket Quantity
zhcn.Ticket-note-showTime: The show time is the label only used to show for the audiences, e.g. 14:00 - 15:30
zhcn.Ticket-note-checkInTime: The check-in time is the label only used to show for the audiences, e.g. 14:00, 15:30
zhcn.VIPQualification-note-enabled: If the VIP code is already got by member, the VIP Code will be also disabled
zhcn.Coupon-note-takenQuantity: This quantity must be less than equals than the quantity
zhcn.AccumulativeActivity-note-remarks: Admin Remarks, no any influence for the activity
